name: surf2vol
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Diffuse surface deformation to volumes using surface and MRI data.

inputs.description: File path for the main fixed surface.
inputs.name: Fixed Surface

inputs.description: File path for the main moving surface.
inputs.name: Moving Surface

inputs.description: Output file for the result, default is out.mgz.
inputs.name: Output File

inputs.description: Output field file, default is out_field.mgz.
inputs.name: Output Field

inputs.description: Path for the output affine file.
inputs.name: Output Affine

inputs.description: Root file name for output surfaces which will have indices appended for each surface.
inputs.name: Output Surface

inputs.description: Root file name for output surfaces with affine transformations.
inputs.name: Output Surface Affine

inputs.description: File path for the output mesh.
inputs.name: Output Mesh

inputs.description: Specifies the x spacing for the deformation grid.
inputs.name: Spacing X

inputs.description: Specifies the y spacing for the deformation grid.
inputs.name: Spacing Y

inputs.description: Specifies the z spacing for the deformation grid.
inputs.name: Spacing Z

inputs.description: Poisson ratio for material properties, default is 0.3.
inputs.name: Poisson Ratio

inputs.description: Factor for dirty regions, between 0 and 1.
inputs.name: Dirty Factor

inputs.description: Enable debug output, writing a morph file at each iteration.
inputs.name: Debug Output

inputs.description: Path to save transformation cache for reusing in subsequent runs.
inputs.name: Cache Transform

output-files.description: Default output of the deformation process.
output-files.name: Output File

output-files.description: Field output of the deformation process.
output-files.name: Output Field
